8-legs-to-love.title: 8 Legs to Love
8-legs-to-love.description: Spin a web, eat bugs, earn points, and have fun!

sketch-world.title: Sketch World
sketch-world.description: A multiplayer 2D platformer with a persistent player-created world.

processing-sketchbook.title: Processing sketchbook
processing-sketchbook.description: Some doodles to get acquainted with Processing.

breakout-ball.title: Breakout Ball
breakout-ball.description: Testing frame-by-frame hitboxes to see how that would feel.

paradox-anomaly.title: Paradox: Anomaly
paradox-anomaly.description: A tile-based puzzle game invovling time travel. The final product would revolve around solving puzzles while avoiding paradoxes that would be caused by interfering with your past self.

boss-rush.title: Boss rush game
boss-rush.description: A platformer intended to be a sequence of boss fights. Only one was fully programmed (with another, a fire queen, in development).

space-team-galaxy-explorer.title: Space Team: Galaxy Explorer
space-team-galaxy-explorer.description: A multiplayer spaceship simulator. The end product would give each player their own dashboard and controls for specific parts of the ship as it hurtled through space.

minisnake.title: minisnake
minisnake.description: An exercise in code golf. The goal was to implement a minimalist version of Snake in the fewest characters possible. The version above is 623 characters minified.

spider-game.title: Spider game
spider-game.description: A simple spider web simulation thrown together during a family vacation.

archery.title: Archery game
archery.description: First foray into WebGL, the cylindrical player model is able to shoot arrows at varying speeds and distances.

alchemy-drop.title: Alchemy Drop
alchemy-drop.description: Non-interactive concepts for a block puzzler. The goal was to make a game where as soon as you cleared any tiles, new tiles would be added in such a way that the combo would continue forever.

zombie-aflockalypse.title: Zombie Aflockalypse
zombie-aflockalypse.description: College submission for a flocking simulation. The zombies (green dots) are programmed to seek out humans (blue dots) while the humans are programmed to stick together and avoid zombies.

hex-world.title: Hex World
hex-world.description: A little hex world with customizable terrain.

nebulaic.title: Nebulaic
nebulaic.description: College project. Simple Flash game with gravitating particles.

physics-engine.title: Untitled
physics-engine.description: The beginnings of my first ever physics engine.

mindsweeper.title: Mindsweeper
mindsweeper.description: An experimental take on Minesweeper for Play With Your Mind.

virtual-pet.title: Virtual Pet
virtual-pet.description: Animation test for a virtual pet game.
